caption: This is a scenic photograph depicting a series of mountain ridges under a sky filled with clouds. The image captures the mountains in layers, each progressively fading into a lighter shade as they recede into the distance, creating a striking depth effect. The mountains nearer to the viewer are sharply defined, while those in the distance become increasingly blurred and misty. The sky above the mountains is a tapestry of clouds, with pink and white hues that suggest the photo was possibly taken during early morning or late evening. A soft sunlight appears to be filtering through the clouds, casting a gentle light over the scene. The overall color palette consists of muted blues, grays, and hints of pink, conveying a calm, serene atmosphere.
title: Mountain range west of Globe
